about_the_game:
Travel between different planets

You finally got an internship at the intergalactic Research Station, congrats! You messed up with coords and landed far away from your destination, but who cares? You'll be there in no time! Survive the route to the Research Station, experience gravity inversion, conversion to a hologram and weightlessness, talk to burn-out workers, and of course - avoid getting killed by local aliens!

Jump, dodge, jump, collect, die... wait, what?

Talk to smart workers

Don't eat too much before the gravity inversion!

Surf through the HoloNet

Look into beautiful eyes



Game features:
  • 4 unique worlds with different mechanics inside
  • 40 hand-crafted levels (+ additional levels for collecting stars)
  • different enemies on every planet
  • 4 bosses
  • funny dialogues with quirky space station workers
  • this list will be updated soon with more features as I will add it to the game :)

Please note: Space Intern is a title that is still in development, any information provided here may be subject to future changes. This page will be updated with more information, and details as content development progress. Thank you for your understanding.

short_description: You finally got an internship at the intergalactic Research Station, congrats! Now you need to get there! Survive on a hostile planet, experience gravity inversion, conversion to a hologram, and weightlessness. Talk to burn-out workers, and of course - avoid getting killed by local aliens!
